title: Breakingviews TV: Soaring drones
text:
Breakingviews TV: Soaring drones Friday, March 23, 2018 - 04:24 
DJI, the Shenzhen-based maker of recreational unmanned aircraft, is raising up to $800 mln at a $15 bln valuation ahead of a possible IPO. Robyn Mak and Jeffrey Goldfarb discuss how big a risk its plans are for investors amid a U.S. backlash against nearly all things Chinese.   
DJI, the Shenzhen-based maker of recreational unmanned aircraft, is raising up to $800 mln at a $15 bln valuation ahead of a possible IPO. Robyn Mak and Jeffrey Goldfarb discuss how big a risk its plans are for investors amid a U.S. backlash against nearly all things Chinese.  //reut.rs/2pyLsdF
